scripts.docu: npm run docu:client && npm run docu:core
scripts.docu:generate:section: npm run docu:client:generate:section && npm run docu:core:generate:section
scripts.docu:client: npm run docu:client:validate && npm run docu:client:generate:section
scripts.docu:client:generate:section: documentation readme client/src/luigi-client.js -f md --readme-file=./docs/luigi-client-api.md --section='Luigi Client API' --markdown-toc=false --quiet --github false
scripts.docu:core: npm run docu:core:validate && npm run docu:core:generate:config && npm run docu:core:generate:dom-elements && npm run docu:core:generate:auth && npm run docu:core:generate:navigation && npm run docu:core:generate:i18n
scripts.docu:core:validate: documentation lint --shallow core/src/core-api/config.js core/src/core-api/elements.js core/src/core-api/auth.js core/src/core-api/navigation.js core/src/core-api/i18n.js
scripts.docu:core:generate:config: documentation readme core/src/core-api/config.js --shallow -f md --section='Luigi Config' --readme-file=./docs/luigi-core-api.md --markdown-toc=false --github false --quiet
